text.div:
StructuredDataCapture

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/sdc/ImplementationGuide/hl7.fhir.uv.sdc

The SDC specification provides an infrastructure to standardize the capture and expanded use of patient-level data collected within an EHR.<br/>This includes two components:<br/>* Support more sophisticated questionnaire/form use-cases such as those needed for research, oncology, pathology and other clinical domains.<br/>*Support pre-population and auto-population of EHR data into forms/questionnaires for uses outside direct clinical care (patient safety, adverse event reporting, public health reporting, etc.).

name: StructuredDataCapture
title: Structured Data Capture
publisher: HL7 International - FHIR Infrastructure Work Group
description:
The SDC specification provides an infrastructure to standardize the capture and expanded use of patient-level data collected within an EHR.
This includes two components:
* Support more sophisticated questionnaire/form use-cases such as those needed for research, oncology, pathology and other clinical domains.
*Support pre-population and auto-population of EHR data into forms/questionnaires for uses outside direct clinical care (patient safety, adverse event reporting, public health reporting, etc.).

resource.name: SDC Form Designer
resource.description: SDC Form authoring system

resource.name: SDC Form Response Manager
resource.description: SDC Form response management system

resource.name: SDC Form Filler
resource.description: SDC System for completing forms

resource.name: SDC Form Manager
resource.description: SDC Repository for forms

resource.name: SDC Form Receiver
resource.description: SDC Repository for completed forms

resource.name: SDC Form Archiver
resource.description: SDC System for archiving and retrieving the completed forms

resource.name: SDC Usage Context
resource.description: Constraints on the codes and values of UsageContext to help ensure consistent usage in SDC Questionnaires

resource.name: SDC Base Questionnaire
resource.description: Sets expectations for SDC-conformant systems around how to create questionnaires

resource.name: Search Questionnaire
resource.description: Defines properties that must be supported for systems that support searching for and returning Questionnaires

resource.name: Advanced Rendering Questionnaire
resource.description: Defines additional capabilities for controlling the rendering of the questionnaire.

resource.name: Advanced Behavior Questionnaire
resource.description: Defines additional capabilities for controlling data entry and calculating values within the questionnaire.

resource.name: Populatable Questionnaire - Observation
resource.description: Defines elements that support auto-population and pre-population of questionnaires using the Observation-based population mechanism.

resource.name: Populatable Questionnaire - Expression
resource.description: Defines elements that support auto-population and pre-population of questionnaires using the Expression-based population mechanism.

resource.name: Populatable Questionnaire - StructureMap
resource.description: Defines elements that support auto-population and pre-population of questionnaires using the StructureMap-based population mechanism.

resource.name: Extractable Questionnaire - Observation
resource.description: Defines elements that allow conversion of a QuestionnaireResponse to an Observation resource or Bundle of Observation resources using the Observation-based extraction mechanism

resource.name: Extractable Questionnaire - Definition
resource.description: Defines elements that allow conversion of a QuestionnaireResponse to a FHIR resource or Bundle of FHIR resources using the Definition-based extraction mechanism

resource.name: Extractable Questionnaire - StructureMap
resource.description: Defines elements that allow conversion of a QuestionnaireResponse to a FHIR resource or Bundle of FHIR resources using the StructureMap-based extraction mechanism

resource.name: Adaptive Questionnaire
resource.description: Defines the metadata that should be present to embedding an adaptive Questionnaire as part of a QuestionnaireResponse

resource.name: Adaptive Questionnaire - search
resource.description: Defines the metadata that should be present to support searching for adaptive questionnaires.

resource.name: SDC Questionnaire Response
resource.description: Sets expectations for SDC-conformant systems around how to create responses to questionnaires.

resource.name: Adaptive Questionnaire Response
resource.description: Represents a response to a questionnaire that is dynamically built as each question is answered.

resource.name: SDC Value Set
resource.description: Sets expectations for SDC-conformant systems around the definition of value sets for use with questionnaires.

resource.name: SDC Code System
resource.description: Sets expectations for SDC-conformant systems around the definition of code systems to provide values for choices within questionnaires.

resource.name: SDC Library
resource.description: Sets expectations for SDC-conformant systems around the definition of libraries to provide logical expressions within questionnaires.

resource.name: Next question operation input parameters
resource.description: Profile used to validate the parameters that are the input of the 'next question' adaptive questionnaire operation

resource.name: Questionnaire extract operation input parameters
resource.description: Profile used to validate the parameters that are the input of the 'extract' questionnaire operation

resource.name: Next question operation output parameters
resource.description: Profile used to validate the parameters that are the output of the 'next question' adaptive questionnaire operation

resource.name: Process response operation input parameters
resource.description: Profile used to validate the parameters that are the input of the 'process response' questionnaire operation

resource.name: Questionnaire assemble output Parameters profile
resource.description: Profile used to validate the parameters that are the output of the 'assemble' questionnaire operation

resource.name: Entry mode
resource.description: An indication of how the user should be prompted for answers when completing a QuestionnaireResponse

resource.name: Endpoint
resource.description: The base URL for the server to which questionnaire response associated with this questionnaire should be submitted

resource.name: Enable when expression
resource.description: An expression that returns a boolean value for whether to enable the item

resource.name: Min Quantity
resource.description: The inclusive lower bound on the range of allowed values for a 'quantity' type question

resource.name: Max Quantity
resource.description: The inclusive upper bound on the range of allowed values for  a 'quantity' type question

resource.name: Answer Expression
resource.description: An expression (FHIRPath, CQL or FHIR Query) that resolves to a list of permitted answers for a question item.

resource.name: Answer Context Expression
resource.description: A FHIR Query that resolves to one or more resources that can be displayed to the user to help provide context for answering a question

resource.name: Answer Options Toggle Expression
resource.description: A complex expression that provides a list of the allowed options that should be enabled or disabled based on the evaluation of a provided expression.

resource.name: Candidate Answers Expression
resource.description: A FHIRPath or CQL Expression, or FHIR Query that resolves to a list of candidate answers (usually based on other answers in the questionnaire       or based on information within the health record) for the question item or that establishes context for a group item

resource.name: Lookup questionnaire
resource.description: For items of type reference, the reference can be populated either by picking an existing entity or by creating a new one. In the latter case, this Questionnaire allows specifying the Questionnaire to use in creating the target instance. This can be direct (if the Reference is to a Questionnaire) or indirect via mapping if the Reference is to some other sort of resource.

resource.name: Launch Contexts
resource.description: Resources that provide context for form processing logic (pre-population, flow-control, drop-down selection, etc.) when creating/displaying/editing a QuestionnaireResponse

resource.name: Initial Expression
resource.description: Initial value for a question answer as determined by an evaluated expression

resource.name: Calculated Expression
resource.description: Calculated value for a question answer as determined by an evaluated expression

resource.name: Label for 'open' items
resource.description: The label text to display beside free-text and/or unrestricted type values for an ‘open’ choice element. E.g. ‘Other, please specify’, or ‘Additional condition’, or ‘More reason(s)’, etc.

resource.name: Item Media
resource.description: Media to render/make available accompanying the question being asked or group or display item being rendered.

resource.name: Item Answer Media
resource.description: Media to render/make available as an accompaniment to a specific answer option.

resource.name: Width of column
resource.description: When used with an item control that causes the question to appear as a column in a table, indicates the width to give to the column for this question.

resource.name: Collapsible
resource.description: Indicates that the child items of an item are displayed in collapsible form (either collapsed or expanded)

resource.name: Choice column
resource.description: Provides guidelines for rendering multi-column choices

resource.name: Short Text
resource.description: Provides a short text for an item. This element is useful for items that require a shorter text when rendered (e.g. when item is displayed on a mobile phone).

resource.name: Optional Display?
resource.description: If set to true, it means that the system displaying the form (or the individual encoding the form for data capture) can choose to omit the item from display to the user.

resource.name: Source queries for population mapping
resource.description: A Batch Bundle containing a set of queries that should be executed to provide source data for a StructureMap to create a populated QuestionnaireResponse

resource.name: Is subject?
resource.description: If present and true, indicates that the item establishes a different subject for the group in a response

resource.name: Is subject (response)?
resource.description: If present and true, indicates that the item indicates a different subject for this group

resource.name: Item population context
resource.description: Specifies a query that identifies the resource (or set of resources for a repeating item) that should be used to populate this Questionnaire or Questionnaire.item on initial population.

resource.name: Item extraction context
resource.description: Specifies a query that identifies the resource (or set of resources for a repeating item)  to be extracted from this item once the QuestionnaireResponse is complete.

resource.name: Observation link period
resource.description: Indicates the time-period (from 'now') to search for observations that match the Questionnaire.item.code and Questionnaire.subject when pre-populating the QuestionnaireResponse.

resource.name: Observation extract?
resource.description: If true, indicates that the observation-based approach should be used to extract either the particular item (if extension is defined on an individual question or group based on the code present) or all items in the questionnaire (if defined at the questionnaire root and if they have a code present)

resource.name: Observation Extract Category
resource.description: Indicates the Observation.category value(s) that should appear on extracted Observations for the entire Questionnaire or for the current item and descendant items.

resource.name: Source structure map
resource.description: StructureMaps that produce QuestionnaireResponses for this Questionnaire as 'target' - i.e. that can be used to create QuestionnaireResponses that are valid against this Questionnaire.

resource.name: Target structure map
resource.description: StructureMaps that have QuestionnaireResponses of this Questionnaire as 'source'- i.e. that can be used to create other artifacts from QuestionnaireResponses that are valid against this Questionnaire.

resource.name: Performer type
resource.description: Indicates the types of resources that can record answers to a Questionnaire

resource.name: Questionnaire Adaptive
resource.description: Indicates if a questionnaire is adaptive: either set to true or set the base URL of the server that can perform the nextQuestion operation of the questionnaire

resource.name: Preferred Terminology Server
resource.description: Indicates the terminology server(s) that are known to be capable of returning and potentially expanding the value set(s) associated with the whole questionnaire or a particular group or question within the questionnaire (depending on where the extension appears).

resource.name: Questionnaire Context Species ValueSet
resource.description: Species for defining the context of Questionnaires

resource.name: Questionnaire Launch Context ValueSet
resource.description: Defines standard context of Questionnaires at launch time

resource.name: Questionnaire Launch Context CodeSystem
resource.description: Defines standard context of Questionnaires at launch time

resource.name: Questionnaire Entry Mode ValueSet
resource.description: Defines mechanisms of capturing data in a QuestionnaireResponse

resource.name: Questionnaire Entry Mode CodeSystem
resource.description: Defines mechanisms of capturing data in a QuestionnaireResponse

resource.name: Questionnaire Collapsible ValueSet
resource.description: Defines mechanisms of displaying child items in collapsible form

resource.name: Questionnaire Collapsible CodeSystem
resource.description: Defines mechanisms of displaying child items in collapsible form

resource.name: Adaptive questionnaire next question
resource.description: Returns the next question or set of questions for an adaptive questionnaire

resource.name: Populate Questionnaire
resource.description: Generates a QuestionnaireResponse from a Questionnaire, possibly with data partially populated

resource.name: Populate HTML Questionnaire
resource.description: Generates an HTML representation of the Questionnaire as a form, possibly partially populated with data

resource.name: Populate Questionnaire Link
resource.description: Generates a link to an HTML page that can be used to complete the Questionnaire, possibly partially populated with data

resource.name: Questionnaire process response
resource.description: Allows submission of a QuestionnaireRespone for 'processing' by the target server

resource.name: Questionnaire response extract to resource(s)
resource.description: Converts a QuestionnaireResponse to a clinical or administrative resource or a Transaction Bundle of them

resource.name: Questionnaire Item definition
resource.description: Allows searching by 'definition' element within a Questionnaire's items

resource.name: Questionnaire Assembled From Search Parameter
resource.description: Allows searching by 'assembledFrom' extension on a Questionnaire

resource.name: Questionnaire Is Modular Search Parameter
resource.description: Allows searching by 'assemble-expectation' extension on a Questionnaire

resource.name: SDC-Combination
resource.description: Set of several examples - medication, AHRQ and NCI forms

resource.name: SDC-PHQ9
resource.description: Patient Health Questionnaire (9 Item) including contained value sets and calculatedExpression

resource.name: SDC-Pathology
resource.description: Cancer pathology questionnaire with flow-control extensions

resource.name: SDC-Hard Coronary Heart Disease
resource.description: A made-up form for calculating the 10-year-risk of Hard Coronary Heart Disease. It shows how variables and calculatedExpression can be used to compute for the risk probability.

resource.name: SDC-Hunger Vital Sign
resource.description: A hunger vital signs form (showing calculatedExpression selecting a value from a list).

resource.name: SDC-LOINC AHRQ
resource.description: LOINC perspective on the AHRQ form found in the SDC - Combination set of questionnaires

resource.name: SDC-Weight and Height Tracking Panel
resource.description: A weight and height panel (from LOINC) with a FHIRPath rule for calculating the BMI.

resource.name: SDC Test Form - All Data Types
resource.description: A test form that has one of each data type included, useful in checking compatibility against.

resource.name: SDC-Advanced Rendering
resource.description: Demo questionnaire showing most of the advanced rendering capabilities of SDC. Each example here is itemized in the Examples page.

resource.name: Questionnaire - ANC Quick Check
resource.description: A sample questionnaire using itemMedia and itemAnswerMedia extensions.

resource.name: SDC-Example with Image Options
resource.description: Example questionnaire that shows how to display answer options as images using the rendering-xhtml extension.

resource.name: SDC-Advanced Form Behavior
resource.description: Demo questionnaire showing most of the advanced form behavior capabilities of SDC. Each example here is itemized in the Examples page.

resource.name: SDC-Example using contextExpression
resource.description: Example to indicate the resources to make available for display to the user to aid in answering the question.

resource.name: SDC-Example using ordinalValue and constraint
resource.description: Example on how to use ordinal value and contraints in a Questionnaire.

resource.name: SDC Test Form - Enable When
resource.description: A test form that has a variety of enable when scenarios for testing.

resource.name: SDC Test Form - Repeats
resource.description: A test form with repeatable nested groups.

resource.name: SDC Test Form - Required
resource.description: A test form with required fields.

resource.name: SDC-LOINC USSG Family History
resource.description: LOINC US Surgeon General family history including data elements and value sets.

resource.name: Questionnaire - Demographics Example
resource.description: A sample questionnaire using context-based population and extraction

resource.name: SDC Test Form - Candidate Expression
resource.description: A test form with a FHIRPath based prepopulation example that includes a candidate expression.

resource.name: SDC Test Form - Initial Expression
resource.description: A test form with a FHIRPath based prepopulation simple example.

resource.name: SDC Test Form - Source Query
resource.description: A test form with a FhirPath based prepopulation and StructureMap population that leverages a source query to extract data outside the launch context.

resource.name: SDC Test Form - Multiple Initial Value
resource.description: A test form with a question that has multiple initial values.

resource.name: SDC Test Form - Initial Value
resource.description: A test form with that uses initial values.

resource.name: SDC-PHQ9 using an SDC Library
resource.description: Patient Health Questionnaire using a cqf-expression defined in an SDC Library

resource.name: Example multi-subject Questionnaire
resource.description: A sample Questionnaire that shows the use of the isSubject extension to flag a subject change within a Questionnaire.

resource.name: SDOHCC Questionnaire Hunger Vital Sign
resource.description: Example Questionnaire that shows both definition-based population and StructureMap-based extraction

resource.name: Patient Health Questionnaire - adaptive search
resource.description: This is a Questionnaire example of how to expose an adaptive form in a registry.

resource.name: SDC Map population StructureMap example output
resource.description: An example showing the result of a StructureMap-based population operation

resource.name: SDC Map population StructureMap example
resource.description: An example of a StructureMap used to support the population of a QuestionnaireResponse from queried data

resource.name: SDC-Response to LOINC USSG Family History
resource.description: Example response to the SDC-LOINC USSG Family History questionnaire

resource.name: SDC-Response to PHQ9
resource.description: Example response to the SDC-PHQ9 questionnaire

resource.name: SDC-Response to LOINC AHRQ
resource.description: Example response to te LOINC AHRQ questionnaire.

resource.name: Multi-subject QuestionnaireResponse example
resource.description: Example of a QuestionnaireResponse for a multi-subject Questionnaire

resource.name: SDC-Response to Diagnosis NCI Standard Template
resource.description: Example responses to the questionnaire found in the SDC - Combination list of questionnaires

resource.name: SDC-Response to Adaptive PHQ9
resource.description: Example response to the Adaptive SDC-PHQ9 questionnaire

resource.name: SDC-ValueSet AHRQ_Medication_Q1
resource.description: The answer list for question 1 on the AHRQ 'Medication or Other Substance' form

resource.name: Australian States - example value set
resource.description: An example value set (using fake codes) used by a modular Questionnaire

resource.name: SDC-CodeSystem PHQ9
resource.description: The answer list for questions 1 through 9 on the Patient Health Questionnaire (9 item) form

resource.name: Congestive Heart Failure Logic
resource.description: Logic for an example congestive heart failure pathway

resource.name: Example $assemble operation response
resource.description: Shows the result of performing a $assemble operation on the [modular-root](Questionnaire-sdc-modular-root.html) questionnaire

resource.name: Example modular Questionnaire
resource.description: Example modular questionnaire - root of a questionnaire that references other questionnaires and element definitions

resource.name: Example sub-module Questionnaire for contact
resource.description: Example questionnaire module - represents a patient's contacts and is itself a modular questionnaire that references other questionnaires and element definitions

resource.name: Example sub-module Questionnaire for name
resource.description: Example questionnaire module - Used to represent a patient or other human name as an example of a Questionnaire that can be referenced by other Questionnaires.  It is itself modular in that it relies on external element definitions

resource.name: Request-based solicitation example - ServiceRequest
resource.description: Shows a ServiceRequest soliciting completion of a questionnaire

resource.name: Task-based solicitation example
resource.description: Shows how completion of a questionnaire can be solicited with Task alone

resource.name: Request-based solicitation example - Task
resource.description: Shows how completion of a questionnaire can be solicited with Task pointing to a ServiceRequest

resource.name: SDC Map population source bundle example
resource.description: An example of a Batch response containing search results used as an input to a map-based population process

resource.name: CHF Codes
resource.description: Codes used in the congestive heart failure pathway. Ideally these shouldn't exist, but where I couldn't find an appropriate code in a standard terminology, I defined codes here.

resource.name: SDOHCC StructureMap Hunger Vital Sign
resource.description: A map that converts an SDOCC hunger vital sign questionnaire to a Bundle of Conditions and Observations

resource.name: Patient Gender
resource.description: Data element SDC Profile Example

resource.name: SDC Question Library
resource.description: An example library of questions showing how questions can be compiled into a library for use by modular questionnaires

resource.name: Assemble Modular Questionnaire Operation
resource.description: The $assemble operation takes a modular questionnaire (one that references sub-questionnaires and/or relies on definition elements to contain the content for item definitions) and produces the equivalent fully-inline Questionnaire.  Full details on the process can be found [here](modular.html).

resource.name: Assembly Expectations for Questionnaire
resource.description: If present, indicates that this questionnaire has expectations with respect to assembly.  Specifically, indicates whether this form requires assembly (i.e. it can't be used directly without invoking the [$assemble](OperationDefinition-Questionnaire-assemble.html) operation operation on it) and/or whether it is intended for use only as a 'child' in an assembly process.  The assembly processs might mean filling in item metadata based on information looked up from item.definitions and/or retrieving sub-questionnaires pointed to by [sub-questionnaire](StructureDefinition-sdc-questionnaire-subQuestionnaire.html) extensions.

resource.name: Assemble Context extension
resource.description: Indicates a variable that must be available on any node that is referencing the Questionnaire as a sub-questionnaire

resource.name: Assembled From Questionnaire
resource.description: Indicates the Questionnaire a variable that must be available on any node that is referencing the Questionnaire as a sub-questionnaire

resource.name: SDC Modular Questionnaire
resource.description: Indicates expectations for questionnaires that draw their item content (not just codes) from other resources

resource.name: Sub-questionnaire
resource.description: Indicates that the display item on which this extension appears should be replaced with the referenced Questionnaire

resource.name: Units open?
resource.description: Indicates whether the list of supported units (conveyed in other extensions) are the exhaustive list from which the user must choose or whether they're able to select alternate codes or specify a string.

resource.name: Code system for other units
resource.description: If the questionnaire-unit-open extension indicates that additional units other than the set of options provided for the question are allowed, this indicates the code system those units are expected to be drawn from.  This extension SHOULD be present on any question where questionnaire-unit-open allows additional coded values.

resource.name: References contained
resource.description: This indicates that the element containing this extension has some sort of expression that makes reference to the specified contained resource.

resource.name: ServiceRequest Questionnaire
resource.description: Identifies a Questionnaire that is being asked to be completed

resource.name: Questionnaire Service Request
resource.description: Defines how ServiceRequest is used to ask for a Questionnaire to be completed

resource.name: Task Questionnaire
resource.description: Defines how Task is used to ask for a Questionnaire to be completed

resource.name: Assemble Expectation Codes
resource.description: A set of codes that reflect the relevance of the Questionnaire to the $assemble operation - specifically, whether the form needs to be assembled, whether the form can be referenced as a subQuestionnaire and whether the form can be used as the 'root' of a QuestionnaireResponse.

resource.name: Questionnaire answer constraint codes
resource.description: Codes that describe the types of constraints possible on a question item that has a list of permitted answers [Note: This is a clone of QuestionnaireAnswerConstraint codesystem from R5 (adopting R5 capability)]

resource.name: Temporary SDC Codes
resource.description: Defines codes defined within the SDC implementation guide that are expected to migrate elsewhere in future releases

resource.name: Questionnaire Assemble Expectation
resource.description: Defines codes describing how a Questionnaire relates to the 'assemble' process

resource.name: DEX mapping language mime types
resource.description: The list of mime types that identify mapping languages supported by DEX.

resource.name: Questionnaire Performer Type
resource.description: List of resource types that can record answers to a Questionnaire.

resource.name: Questionnaire answer constraints value set
resource.description: Codes that describe the types of constraints possible on a question item that has a list of permitted answers [Note: This is a clone of QuestionnaireAnswerConstraint valueset from R5 (adopting R5 capability)]

resource.name: SDC Task Code
resource.description: The codes allowed for an SDC Task seeking completion of a Questionnaire
